main event: A witness observed a round, reddish-orange object described as a large ball of flame in Ardmore, Pennsylvania on October 1, 1957.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 30 seconds,The object was reported to have a straight course,Only one witness was confirmed for this sighting,The sighting was categorized as probably not reportable,No photographs were included with the report.
sighted object: a round, reddish-orange large ball of flame
